First off.............
 
Wherever you are at with the Ovilus 1 you have to =
let the spirits there  
learn how to communicate thru the unit before you c=
an effectively communicate  
with them.  You do this by telling the spirits=
 that you have this device  and 
that you want to communicate to them thru =
it.   And that they have  to learn how 
to communicate thru it before you c=
an begin.  So you let the  unit run by 
itself for 30 to 60 minutes.  After=
 all the random ramblings  coming from the unit 
have slowed or calmed down=
 then you will be able to  communicate and start to 
receive answers that w=
ill make sense to you.  Its  as simple as that.
 
Jeff
 
 
In a message dat=
ed 9/16/2008 12:14:31 P.M. Central Daylight Time,  
blackbearhollow@gmail.c=
om writes:

 
 
 
Hi Jeff,   


What did you do? The below comments make no=
 sense to me.  What do  you have 
to do "once"? 
Random garbage that made s=
ense? lol! 
What did you do for communication to flow smoothly. Would you  =
elaborate? 


Thanks!
w.

 
=E0=A5=90 




On Sep 16, 2008, at 12:18 PM, _M=
arlboro63@..._ 
(mailto:Marlboro63@...)  wrote:


Now  if you use t=
his device in the same location over and over again you only 
 have to do i=
t once.  When I first got mine it was spewing out all kind  of 
random garb=
age that made sense.  But once I did this the  communication flowed 
fluent=
ly.

w fashion blog, 
plus the latest fall trends and hair styles at StyleList.c=
om.
